Trending

New Arrivals

import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { TrendingProducts } from '../models/trendingProducts'; import { NewArrivals } from '../models/newArrivals'; @Component({ selector: 'app-home', templateUrl: './home.component.html', styleUrls: ['./home.component.css'] }) export class HomeComponent implements OnInit { trendingProducts: TrendingProducts[] = [ { banerimage: 'Baner/Baner_Mobile.png', category: { id: 0, category: 'electronics', subCategory: 'mobiles' } } ] newArrivals:NewArrivals []=[ { banerimage:'Baner/Baner_Laptop.png', category: { id: 0, category: 'electronics', subCategory: 'mobiles' } } ] ngOnInit(): void { } }
